mapper.select: SELECT A.INTE_NO, A.INTE_DATE, A.PR_NO, A.MEM_ID, B.PR_NAME, B.PR_ANNUAL, B.PR_WANTMN, B.PR_WANTJOB, B.REGION_CODE, B.INDUSTRY_CODE, C.MEM_NAME, D.REGION_NAME, E.INDUSTRY_NAME FROM INTEREST A INNER JOIN PR B ON (A.PR_NO = B.PR_NO) INNER JOIN MEMBER C ON (B.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID) INNER JOIN CD_REGION D ON (B.REGION_CODE = D.REGION_CODE) INNER JOIN CD_INDUSTRY E ON (B.INDUSTRY_CODE = E.INDUSTRY_CODE) WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{memId}
